text: Allaha yake patha pradarsana karena, se'i to sathika patha prapta ebam yake patha bhrasta karena, tadera jan'ye apani allaha chara kona sahayyakari pabena na. Ami keyamatera dina tadera samabeta karaba tadera mukhe bhara diye cala abasthaya, andha abasthaya, muka abasthaya ebam badhira abasthaya. Tadera abasasthala jahannama. Yakhana'i nirbapita ha'oyara upakrama habe ami takhana tadera jan'ye agni ara'o brd'dhi kare diba.
